mapper.insert: INSERT INTO quotation_board (post_id, expert_id, category_id, state) VALUES (#{postId}, #{expertId}, #{categoryId}, #{state})
mapper.select: SELECT qb.post_id AS POST_ID, qb.expert_id AS EXPERT_ID, qb.category_id AS CATEGORY_ID, c.name AS CATEGORY_NAME, qb.state AS STATE, b.title AS TITLE, b.content AS CONTENT, b.created_at AS CREATED_AT, b.user_nickname AS USER_NICKNAME, b.userid AS USERID, l.location_id AS LOCATION_ID, l.city AS CITY, l.district AS DISTRICT FROM quotation_board qb JOIN board b ON qb.post_id = b.post_id JOIN category c ON qb.category_id = c.category_id JOIN quotation_location ql ON qb.post_id = ql.post_id JOIN location l ON ql.location_id = l.location_id WHERE qb.category_id IN ( SELECT ec.category_id FROM expert_category ec WHERE ec.user_id = #{userid} ) AND ql.location_id IN ( SELECT el.location_id FROM expert_location el WHERE el.user_id = #{userid} ) ORDER BY qb.post_id DESC, l.location_id

SELECT qb.post_id AS POST_ID, qb.expert_id AS EXPERT_ID, qb.category_id AS CATEGORY_ID, qb.state AS STATE, b.title AS TITLE, b.content AS CONTENT, b.created_at AS CREATED_AT, b.user_nickname AS USER_NICKNAME, b.userid AS USERID, l.location_id AS LOCATION_ID, l.city AS CITY, l.district AS DISTRICT FROM quotation_board qb JOIN board b ON qb.post_id = b.post_id LEFT JOIN quotation_location ql ON qb.post_id = ql.post_id LEFT JOIN location l ON ql.location_id = l.location_id WHERE qb.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY l.location_id
